name: 66 Seconds to Save the World
description:
In 66 Seconds to Save the World, 4 wizards have accidentally summoned a demon and send their best and brightest to find the spellbook which will let them banish it back to where it came from.

Just kidding. They sent Dave. No one has even heard of him until now.

In this game you will control Dave, who has 66 seconds to find the spellbook on an island or the demon will break free.  Will you succeed? Or will the demon break free?

66 Seconds to Save the World is a short RPGMaker Game made for the 24 hour RPGMaker RTP jam. No custom assets are used per the jam rules.
